conbody.p: ​​ organizes users into four management levels: Account, Organization, Team, and Project. The Account level is the highest, followed by the Organization, Team, and Project levels.
​ ​Overall, an Account handles Katalon subscription and billing management, while Organization brings together all teams, projects, and users for collaboration.
​Account and Organization members are assigned different roles with varying permissions and privileges. Those roles are only valid within each Account and Organization.
These administrative roles and permissions do not apply to users with the Member role.
